Returns: Array of MultiAction items to be displayed for this media item row.
getActions().Description: Should override this method in order to provide a custom set of actions for a media item row

ClassDesc: An interface implemented by the user if they wish to provide actions for a media item row to be displayed by an @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#AbstractMediaItemPresenter_E@. A media row consists of media item details together with a number of custom actions, following the media item details. Classes implementing @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#MultiActionsProvider_E@ can define their own media data model within their derived classes. The actions are provided by overriding @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#MultiActionsProvider#getActions_E@ Provided actions should be instances of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#MultiActionsProvider#MultiAction_E@.
